transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Bolo sir.
Customer: Haan ji sir, Gaurav baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Executive: Batao.
Customer: Haan ji sir. Sir, yahi puch raha tha kya issue aa gaya aapne not satisfied diya hua tha aapke account manager sahab ki baat hui thi kya?
Customer: Sir ji wo aap dekho aap mere account open karke dekho abhi aapka lead kitna kaisa lead dikha raha hai aap dekho. Main consume hi nahi kar raha lead aapka. Baad mein aapke yahan se phone aayega aap lead consume nahi kar rahe isiliye aapko lead nahi mila but koi lead achcha ho to main purchase karu na. Aap mera account open karke dekho aapko kitna lead dikh raha hai.
Executive: Sir leads agar main overall baat karu to saat din mein aap chhe din to aapne proper leads consume ki hui hai.
Customer: Are par kaise lead consume ki hai dekho na. Main wahi aapko pata tha aapka ye nahi to wo aapka natak to rehta hi hai bhai dekho lead consume nahi karte to bhi natak rehta hai lead consume aap dekho aap dekho pehle aap dekho uska lead ka dekho kya hai.
Executive: Dekho abhi agar main recent lead ki baat karu to abhi aapke pass self locking cable tie ki aayi hui hai. Ye aapka
Customer: Ruko ruko kab aayi hai ruko.
Executive: Ye abhi 49 minute ago ki aayi hai Ahmedabad Gujarat ki. Maine recent ka filter lagaya hua hai.
Customer: Dekho recent nahi mujhe abhi aap hai na abhi main aapko video call pe dikhau abhi mujhe na symptom box last char din se dikha raha hai jo main nahi bana raha.
Executive: Ek kaam kariye aap usme aap location pe jaiye pehle location pe aapne kya laga rakha hai mere ko ek baar bataiye jab by lead Gujarat lagaya hua hai aapne. Abhi hum dealing Gujarat karte hain ki all India karte hain.
Customer: Are all India bhi karte hain but isme abhi chalo main all location karta hu batao abhi.
Executive: Haan all location lagaye upar recent aur relevant ka do option aa raha hai us pe ek baar aap recent pe click kariye.
Customer: Ek minute ruko kahan pe option hai haan recent wala haan.
Executive: Abhi aap sabse pehle kaun si lead dikh rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Nylon cable ties ki dikh rahi hogi aapko West Bengal ki hai. Uske niche aap dekhenge two ply concrete mein packaging sheet ki dikh rahi hogi GSM 120.
Customer: Bhai ye ye kahan hai dekho Uttar Pradesh yahan se Uttar Pradesh ye material nahi jata.
Executive: Sir kaun wahi to abhi aapne bola all India karte hain. Har baar to application open nahi kar sakta na abhi mobile mein dekhne do ruko aap mobile application pe dikha nahi raha kuch.
Customer: Sir mobile pe abhi main aapko screenshot bhej dunga. Maine pehle bhi dekho maine pehle bhi bola tha mujhe all India kaam nahi karna mujhe only kaam karna hai Gujarat mein.
Executive: Sir wahi to main abhi aap se puch raha tha aapne. Achcha chaliye Gujarat likh ke maine isiliye bola mujhe aap likh ke do aapka yahi rehta hai bhai.
Executive: Sir abhi maine call pe hi aapko suniye sir abhi maine aapko call pe pucha na ki call kahan deal karte ho sir. Meri baat sun lo mujhe hai na aapka koi issue nahi abhi ye maine fir se dobara galti kar diya abhi third time main aapka koi policy nahi lunga kyunki aapka ye successful nahi hai. Har time aapka ye natak rehta hai.
Executive: Sir pehle to aap language aap dhang se baat karna sikhiye pehle. Nahi baat karna mujhe baat nahi karna bhai rakh do ab phone rakh do. Aapse maine sir maine aapko kya maine aapse sir maine aapko call pe kya pucha sir aap kahan deal karte ho aapne bola all India bhi karta hu main maine all India baad mein jao samajh rahe ho na.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hota business aise business aap karte ho na aise.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the leads received.

- States leads are not relevant to his business.

- Wants leads only from Gujarat.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account and lead consumption.

- Executive guided the customer to set location preferences.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer stated he will not renew the policy.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, subscription, all india
